name: Case File Interrogator
description:
A secure, AI-powered RAG system designed for high-volume litigation. Acting as a 'Ruthless Senior Associate,' it ingests raw evidence (PDFs, Images, Text) to generate actionable legal intelligence.

Key Capabilities:
1. Deep Legal Analysis: Instantly extracts 'Critical Findings' using the 'Golden Chain' framework (Duty, Breach, Causation). Specialized protocols include Medical Chronology, Settlement Valuation, Bias Detection, and the 'Liar's List' for witness impeachment.
2. Forensic Visualization: Generates admissible-style evidence visuals (Crime Scene Sketches, Technical Diagrams, Blueprints) and cinematic video reenactments (via Veo) based on case facts.
3. Interactive Interrogation: A secure chat interface with proactive follow-up suggestions, document context, and Google Search grounding for legal precedents.
4. Visual Timelines: Auto-generates chronological visual frameworks of key events.
5. Executive Summaries: Instant extraction of parties, jurisdiction, and incident synopsis with automated tagging.
